src:
Laga Tunda Persebaya Vs PSM Kemungkinan Digelar Saat FIFA Matchday
04 Nov 2019, 20:23 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Laga tunda Persebaya Surabaya kontra PSM Makassar pada pekan ke-26 Shopee Liga 1 2019 kemungkinan besar digelar saat FIFA Matchday. Mengingat hanya pada rentang waktu tersebut yang paling memungkinkan menggelar pertandingan.
Hal itu diungkapkan manajer Persebaya, Chandra Wahyudi. Karena menurutnya, berdasarkan hasil emergency meeting yang diikuti seluruh manajer, kompetisi Liga 1 tidak boleh mundur dari tanggal 22 Desember 2019.
"Sebenarnya kesepakatannya tidak boleh kompetisi ini mundur dari tanggal 22 Desember, permasalahannya ini jadwal terus berjalan," kata Chandra Wahyudi kepada Bola.net, Senin (4/11/2019).
"Waktu luangnya mau tidak mau di jeda FIFA Matchday, setelah lawan Tira Persikabo," imbuh manajer asal Bojonegoro tersebut.
Sementara menurut kalender FIFA, jeda internasional akan berlangsung pada tanggal 11 sampai 19 November 2019. Sehingga, Persebaya akan mengantisipasi adanya pertandingan pada tanggal-tanggal tersebut.

Scroll ke bawah untuk informasi selengkapnya ya Bolaneters.
text:
Postponing Match Persebaya Vs PSM Likely To Be Held During FIFA Matchday
Nov 04 2019, 20:23 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Persebaya Surabaya's postponement match against PSM Makassar in the 26th week of Shopee Liga 1 2019 will most likely be held during FIFA Matchday. Considering only in that time span is the most likely to hold a match.
This was revealed by the manager of Persebaya, Chandra Wahyudi. Because according to him, based on the results of an emergency meeting that was followed by all managers, the League 1 competition must not retreat from December 22, 2019.
"Actually, the agreement cannot be withdrawn from December 22, the problem is that the schedule continues to run," Chandra Wahyudi told Bola.net on Monday (11/04/2019).
"His spare time is inevitably paused by FIFA Matchday, after the opponent Tira Persikabo," added the manager from Bojonegoro.
Meanwhile, according to the FIFA calendar, the international break will take place on 11 to 19 November 2019. So, Persebaya will anticipate matches on those dates.

Scroll down for more information, Bolaneters.
